SEARCH
Module methanol.testing
Package com.github.mizosoft.methanol.testing.store

Annotation Interface StoreSpec

@Target({METHOD,CONSTRUCTOR}) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface StoreSpec
Specifies one or more Store configurations for a test case.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    int
    appVersion
     
    boolean
    autoAdvanceClock
    Whether MockClock should automatically advance itself by 1 second.
    boolean
    dispatchEagerly
    Whether MockDelayer should eagerly dispatch ready tasks (tasks whose delay is evaluated) whenever a task is submitted.
    int
    editorLockInactiveTtlSeconds
    The number of seconds an inactive editor lock gets to live.
    StoreConfig.Execution
    execution
     
    StoreConfig.FileSystemType[]
    fileSystem
     
    int
    indexUpdateDelaySeconds
    Delay between automatic index updates done by the disk store.
    long
    maxSize
     
    StoreConfig.StoreType[]
    skipped
    Specifies StoreTypes to skip in testing.
    int
    staleEntryInactiveTtlSeconds
    The number of seconds an inactive stale entry gets to live.
    StoreConfig.StoreType[]
    tested
     

  • Element Details

    • tested

      StoreConfig.StoreType[] tested
      Default:
      {MEMORY, DISK, REDIS_STANDALONE, REDIS_CLUSTER}

    • skipped

      StoreConfig.StoreType[] skipped
      Specifies StoreTypes to skip in testing.
      Default:
      {}

    • maxSize

      long maxSize
      Default:
      9223372036854775807L

    • fileSystem

      StoreConfig.FileSystemType[] fileSystem
      Default:
      {IN_MEMORY, SYSTEM, EMULATED_WINDOWS, NONE}

    • execution

      StoreConfig.Execution execution
      Default:
      ASYNC

    • appVersion

      int appVersion
      Default:
      1

    • indexUpdateDelaySeconds

      int indexUpdateDelaySeconds
      Delay between automatic index updates done by the disk store.
      Default:
      -1

    • autoAdvanceClock

      boolean autoAdvanceClock
      Whether MockClock should automatically advance itself by 1 second.
      Default:
      true

    • dispatchEagerly

      boolean dispatchEagerly
      Whether MockDelayer should eagerly dispatch ready tasks (tasks whose delay is evaluated) whenever a task is submitted.
      Default:
      true

    • editorLockInactiveTtlSeconds

      int editorLockInactiveTtlSeconds
      The number of seconds an inactive editor lock gets to live.
      Default:
      -1

    • staleEntryInactiveTtlSeconds

      int staleEntryInactiveTtlSeconds
      The number of seconds an inactive stale entry gets to live.
      Default:
      -1
